ud2.8:1.2: At one time the Buddha was staying near Kuṇḍiyā in the Kuṇḍadhāna Grove.
ud2.8:1.3: Now at that time Suppavāsā the Koliyan had been pregnant for seven years, and in difficult labor for seven days.
ud2.8:1.4: While suffering painful, sharp, severe, acute feelings, three thoughts helped her endure:
ud2.8:1.5: “The Blessed One is truly a fully awakened Buddha, who teaches the Dhamma for giving up suffering such as this.
ud2.8:1.6: The Saṅgha of the Buddha’s disciples is truly practicing well, who practice for giving up suffering such as this.
ud2.8:1.7: Extinguishment is so very blissful, wherein such suffering is not found.”
